question: Two thin long parallel wires separated by a distance ‘r’ from each other in vacuum carry a current of I ampere in opposite directions. Then, they will
choices: Attract each other with a force per unit length of μ₀I² / 2πr
Repel each other with a force per unit length of μ₀I² / 2πr
Repel each other with a force per unit length of μ₀I / 2πr²
Attract each other with a force per unit length of μ₀I² / 2πr²
explanation: Currents in opposite directions repel each other.
Force per unit length is given by F/l = μ₀I₁I₂ / 2πr.
Since I₁ = I₂ = I, F/l = μ₀I² / 2πr.
